sourcesContent:
<template>
  <nav>
    <router-link to="/">Home</router-link> |
    <router-link to="/about">About</router-link>
  </nav>
  <router-view/>
</template>

<style>
  li {
  list-style: none;
}

a {
  text-decoration: none;
}

a:hover {
  color: rgb(27, 27, 126);
}

html, body {
  box-sizing: border-box;
  line-height: 1.5em;
  font-size: 1.1em;
}

button {
  background-color: rgba(128, 152, 204, 0.534);
  color: white;
  border: 1px solid;
  border-radius: 30px;
  height: 35px;
  width: auto;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: 500ms ease-in-out;
}

input {
  width: 120px;
  height: 25px;
  border: 1px solid black;
}

select {
  width: 120px;
  height: 25px;
  border: 1px solid black;
}

button:hover {
  transform: scale(1.1);
}

.main {
  display: block;
  background-color: rgba(128, 152, 204, 0.534);
}

.nav {
  width: 100%;
  background-color: aliceblue;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: space-between;
  margin: auto;
}
.nav__logo {
  float: left;
}
.nav__logo img {
  float: left;
  margin: 10px auto auto 20px;
}
.nav__menu {
  text-align: center;
}
.nav__menu li {
  display: inline;
  margin: 5px;
}
.nav__menu li a {
  color: black;
}
.nav__menu li a:hover {
  color: rgb(27, 27, 126);
}
.nav__login {
  float: right;
}
.nav__login ul li {
  display: inline;
  margin: 5px;
}
.nav__login ul li a {
  color: black;
}

.top {
  height: 350px;
  margin: 30px auto;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: space-between;
  margin: auto;
  width: 80%;
  text-align: left;
  padding-top: 90px;
}
.top__text {
  text-align: left;
  flex: 1;
  width: 80%;
  margin: auto;
  padding-right: 30px;
}
.top__text__title {
  color: rgb(27, 27, 126);
  font-size: 2.2em;
  font-weight: bold;
}
.top__text__text {
  font-size: 1em;
}
.top__text__subtitle {
  font-size: 1.2em;
}
.top__text__items {
  text-align: left;
  margin: auto 0;
}
.top__text__items li {
  display: inline;
  margin: 10px;
  text-align: left;
}
.top__image {
  flex: 1;
}
.top__image__box {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: space-between;
  margin: auto;
  justify-content: no;
  margin: 90px auto;
}
.top__image__box img {
  width: 150px;
  height: auto;
  margin: auto;
  flex: 1;
}

.reasons {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: space-between;
  margin: auto;
  text-align: center;
  width: 100%;
  margin: 70px auto;
}
.reasons__title {
  color: purple;
  text-align: center;
  font-size: 1.9em;
}
.reasons__sections {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: space-between;
  margin: auto;
  width: 80%;
}
.reasons__sections__box {
  flex: 1;
  text-align: center;
}
.reasons__sections__box .box-img {
  background-color: rgb(212, 194, 212);
  width: 50px;
  height: 50px;
  border-radius: 40px;
  margin: auto;
  text-align: center;
  position: relative;
}
.reasons__sections__box .box-img p {
  position: absolute;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
}
.simulator {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: space-between;
  margin: auto;
  background-color: rgb(178, 178, 185);
  text-align: center;
  height: 190px;
  padding-bottom: 30px;
  padding-top: 30px;
  width: 100%;
  margin: 30px auto;
}
.simulator h3 {
  font-size: 1.9em;
}
.simulator__text {
  margin: -30px auto;
}
.simulator__buttons {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: space-between;
  margin: auto;
}
.simulator__buttons form {
  flex: 1;
  margin: 10px;
}

.about {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: space-between;
  margin: auto;
  text-align: center;
}
.about__left {
  padding-top: 50px;
  flex: 1;
}
.about__left__title {
  color: purple;
  font-size: 1.9em;
}
.about__left__text {
  width: 80%;
  margin: auto;
  text-align: left;
}
.about__left__btn {
  background-color: rgba(128, 152, 204, 0.534);
  color: white;
  border: 1px solid;
  border-radius: 30px;
  height: 35px;
  width: auto;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: 500ms ease-in-out;
  margin: 20px auto;
}
.about__img {
  flex: 1;
}
.about__img img {
  width: 80%;
}

.care {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: space-between;
  margin: auto;
  width: 80%;
}
.care .card {
  flex: 1;
  margin: auto;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: space-between;
  margin: auto;
}
.care .card__icon {
  text-align: center;
  position: relative;
}
.care .card__icon i {
  font-size: 3em;
  width: 30%;
  position: absolute;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
}
.care .card__text {
  width: 70%;
}
.care .card__text__text {
  width: 80%;
  text-align: left;
}

.payments {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: space-between;
  margin: auto;
  height: 300px;
  width: 100%;
}
.payments__title {
  text-align: center;
}
.payments__items {
  text-align: center;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: space-between;
  margin: auto;
  width: 100%;
}
.payments__items__item {
  margin: auto;
}
.payments__items__item img {
  width: 150px;
  height: 150px;
  border-radius: 50px;
  margin: auto;
}

.login {
  margin: 35px auto;
  width: 500px;
  display: block;
  background-color: rgb(27, 27, 126);
  text-align: center;
}
.login__top {
  width: 120px;
  height: 70px;
  margin: auto;
}
.login__text {
  color: white;
  font-weight: bold;
}
.login__items {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: space-between;
  margin: auto;
  width: 80%;
  flex-direction: row;
  margin: 20px auto;
}
.login__items input {
  width: 100%;
}
.login__items select {
  width: 120px;
  height: 25px;
  border: 1px solid black;
}
.login__items label {
  text-align: left;
}

.dashboard {
  display: block;
}
.dashboard__top {
  background-color: white;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: space-between;
  margin: auto;
}
.dashboard__main {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: space-between;
  margin: auto;
}
.dashboard__main__menu {
  width: 25%;
  float: left;
  background-color: rgb(34, 26, 26);
  display: block;
}
.dashboard__main__menu ul li {
  display: block;
}
.dashboard__main__menu ul li a {
  color: white;
}
.dashboard__content .infos {
  width: 350px;
  margin: 20px auto auto 0;
  border: 1px solid black;
  display: block;
}
.dashboard__content .infos__top {
  text-align: left;
}
.dashboard__content .infos__curr {
  display: block;
}
.dashboard__content .infos__curr .curr-top {
  color: red;
}
.dashboard__content .infos__curr .curr-top span {
  float: right;
}
.dashboard__content .history {
  width: 80%;
}

.footer {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: space-between;
  margin: auto;
}
.footer__item {
  flex: 1;
}
.footer__item ul li {
  display: block;
}
.footer__item ul li h4 {
  font-weight: bold;
}/*# sourceMappingURL=main.css.map */
</style>
